Unconscionability.definition: the state or condition of being unconscionable [the issue of is to be decided by the court "J. D. Calamari and J. M. Perillo"] see also procedural unconscionability
Unconscionability.origin: [the issue of is to be decided by the court "J. D. Calamari and J. M. Perillo"]

1.definition: the state or condition of being unconscionable [the issue of is to be decided by the court "J. D. Calamari and J. M. Perillo"] see also,

2.definition: a doctrine in contract law: a court may grant relief from or deny enforcement of all or part of a contract if it is found to be unconscionable
